content: *this simple prayer shawl is a popular pattern for charity crafting lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60392-c skill level beginner moonlight mohair article #510 12 balls *shown in safari* crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm rectangular wrap is worked in half_double_crochet finished with fringe see ravelry elegant comfort shawl knit 1 for the knit version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/elegant-comfort-shawl-knit
